type.name: T:Elysium.Controls.Automation.CommandButtonAutomationPeer
type.summary: Comes as a provider of the type for the UI Automation technology.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.CommandButtonAutomationPeer.#ctor(Elysium.Controls.CommandButton)
method.summary: Creates a new instance of the class .
method.param: An instance of the class , for which the provider will be used.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.CommandButtonAutomationPeer.GetClassNameCore
method.summary: Returns such a class name , which is connected with current object. This method is called by .

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.CommandButtonAutomationPeer.GetPattern(System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface)
method.summary: Returns a template of the control for an instance of the control , which is connected with current object .
method.returns: If a parameter has a value , the method will return "this", otherwise "null" will be returned.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.CommandButtonAutomationPeer.Invoke
method.summary: Sends a request for element's activation and initiates its only and unambiguous action.
